page.title: 03HACKLINGE AREA POPULATION
page.content:
The population numbers 520 adults and children approx. The densest area is in the Mining Village known as the Circle.
Most inhabitants chose to reside in the area and are happy living here. It is generally hoped there will be little or no change. In fact many felt that any change might be for the worse. An exception to this view was in Burgess Green where they suffer from noise and pollution from the pit lorries. The younger people hoped for more employmment opportunities and many wished for more leisure and sports facilities to be nearer home. The scenery and peace are appreciated and in some cases are the reasons for choosing to live here.
